items.sentence: Tom waited outside in the pouring rain for over an hour.
I never dreamed you\'d get so good at French so quickly.
The squirrel climbed all the way to the top of the tree.
The way you talk is going to get you in trouble someday.
The young girl was in the next room playing with a doll.
There was nothing interesting on TV, so I turned it off.
I wish you didn\'t hang out with Tom. I don\'t like him.
We all chipped in to buy our teacher a birthday present.
We have almost three more hours before we have to leave.
What are some of the difficulties you face in your work?
